comments:
The AC Probekit editor can't handle empty *.probe files: it throws an XML 
parsing exception.

But empty files happen all the time: right-click on a project and say New, 
choose File, and name the file something.probe ... this will open the AC 
probekit editor and then die on the empty file.

Here's what I saw:

Even before the New File dialog was gone, I got an alert box: Unable to create 
part: sample.probe

Dismiss that and I got "An error has occurred when activating this view."

The Console window in the development workbench that I launched the run-time 
workbench from showed an exception dump, starting thus:

org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Premature end of file.
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at org.xml.sax.SAXException.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at org.xml.sax.SAXParseException.<init>(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.util.ErrorHandlerWrapper.createSAXParseException
(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.util.ErrorHandlerWrapper.fatalError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLErrorReporter.reportError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLErrorReporter.reportError(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.impl.XMLVersionDetector.determineDocVersion
(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XML11Configuration.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.XMLParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.apache.xerces.parsers.AbstractSAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser.parse(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLLoadImpl.load(XMLLoadImpl.java:126)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMLResourceImpl.doLoad
(XMLResourceImpl.java:153)
	at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceImpl.load
(ResourceImpl.java:878)
...emf resource stuff deleted...
	at org.eclipse.emf.edit.domain.AdapterFactoryEditingDomain.loadResource
(AdapterFactoryEditingDomain.java:297)
	at 
com.ibm.etools.probekit.editor.presentation.ProbekitEditor.createPages
(ProbekitEditor.java:653)

...Eclipse openEditor stuff deleted...

	at org.eclipse.ui.ide.IDE.openEditor(IDE.java:265)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.wizards.newresource.BasicNewFileResourceWizard.performFinish
(BasicNewFileResourceWizard.java:102)

...and so on. The full stack trace (107 frames deep!) is attached.

Created an attachment (id=9512)
The full exception stack trace

Now that I can file bugs into the IIOSB database (Autonomic Computing, AC), I 
am closing this bug in the Hyades database. See IIOSB bug number 32767.
